Title: Mad Max
Description: In a self-destructing world, a vengeful Australian policeman sets out to stop a violent motorcycle gang.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Action film is a film genre in which the protagonist is thrust into a series of events that typically involve violence and physical feats.

Director.Name: George Miller
Director.Bio: George Miller is an Australian film director, screenwriter, producer, and former medical doctor.

Title: Heat
Description: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.

Genre.Name: Crime
Genre.Description: A crime story is often about a crime that is being committed or was committed, but can also be an account of a criminal's life.

Director.Name: Michael Mann
Director.Bio: As a director, screenwriter, and producer, four-time Academy AwardÂ© nominee Michael Mann has established himself as one of the most innovative and influential filmmakers in American cinema.

Title: Ford vs. Ferrari
Description: American car designer Carroll Shelby and driver Ken Miles battle corporate interference and the laws of physics to build a revolutionary race car for Ford in order to defeat Ferrari at the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 1966.

Genre.Name: Biography
Genre.Description: The details of the life story of a real person, told by someone else.

Director.Name: James Mangold
Director.Bio: James Mangold is an American film and television director, screenwriter and producer.

Title: True Romance
Description: In Detroit, a lonely pop culture geek marries a call girl, steals cocaine from her pimp, and tries to sell it in Hollywood. Meanwhile, the owners of the cocaine, the Mob, track them down in an attempt to reclaim it.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Drama is the specific mode of fiction represented in performance: a play, opera, mime, ballet, etc., performed in a theatre, or on radio or television.

Director.Name: Quentin Tarantino
Director.Bio: Quentin Jerome Tarantino was born in Knoxville, Tennessee.

Title: Men Who Stare at Goats
Description: A reporter in Iraq might just have the story of a lifetime when he meets Lyn Cassady, a guy who claims to be a former member of the U.S. Army's New Earth Army, a unit that employs paranormal powers in their missions.

Genre.Name: War
Genre.Description: War film is a film genre concerned with warfare, typically about naval, air, or land battles, with combat scenes central to the drama.

Director.Name: Grant Heslov
Director.Bio: He is a producer and actor, known for Argo (2012), Good Night, and Good Luck. (2005) and The Ides of March (2011).

Title: Lord of War
Description: An arms dealer confronts the morality of his work as he is being chased by an INTERPOL Agent.

Genre.Name: War
Genre.Description: War film is a film genre concerned with warfare, typically about naval, air, or land battles, with combat scenes central to the drama.

Director.Name: Andrew Niccol
Director.Biography: Andrew Niccol is a New Zealander who began his career directing TV commercials in London.

Title: War Dogs
Description: Loosely based on the true story of two young men, David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli, who won a three hundred million dollar contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan.

Genre.Name: Biography
Genre.Description: The details of the life story of a real person, told by someone else.

Director.Name: Todd Phillips
Director.Bio: Todd Phillips is an American filmmaker and actor who got his start by directing the comedy films Road Trip and Old School, the earlier inspired EuroTrip.

Title: The Big Short
Description: In 2006-2007 a group of investors bet against the US mortgage market. In their research, they discover how flawed and corrupt the market is.

Genre.Name: Biography
Genre.Description: The details of the life story of a real person, told by someone else.

Director.Name: Adam McKay
Director.Bio: Adam McKay is an American screenwriter, director, comedian, and actor. McKay has a comedy partnership with Will Ferrell, with whom he co-wrote the films Anchorman, Talladega Nights, and The Other Guys.

Title: No Country for Old Men
Description: Violence and mayhem ensue after a hunter stumbles upon a drug deal gone wrong and more than two million dollars in cash near the Rio Grande.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Drama is the specific mode of fiction represented in performance: a play, opera, mime, ballet, etc., performed in a theatre, or on radio or television.

Director.Name: Ethan Coen and Joel Coen
Director.Bio: The younger brother of Joel, Ethan Coen is an Academy Award and Golden Globe winning writer, producer and director coming from small independent films to big profile Hollywood films.

Title: True Grit
Description: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

Genre.Name: Drama
Genre.Description: Drama is the specific mode of fiction represented in performance: a play, opera, mime, ballet, etc., performed in a theatre, or on radio or television.

Director.Name: Ethan Coen and Joel Coen
Director.Bio: The younger brother of Joel, Ethan Coen is an Academy Award and Golden Globe winning writer, producer and director coming from small independent films to big profile Hollywood films.
